Text:
Traffic stands still southbound on Interstate 270 at the Dougherty Ferry Road overpass after power lines fell across the interstate, blocking access to the area on Wednesday, Feb. 24, 2016. Photo by Robert Cohen, rcohen@post-dispatch.com All lanes of Interstate 270 between Manchester Road and Interstate 44 will be closed at 2 a.m. Sunday so Ameren crews can reset utility lines over the interstate, the Missouri Department of Transportation said.
